gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it leads to neglecting my responsibilities or duties towards others?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: to your own needs and desires
rather than being mindful of your physical health
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking, especially when it comes to your own needs and desires rather than being mindful of your physical health?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking, allowing such habits to become detrimental to my overall well-being and relationship with God?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked financial resources entrusted to me, prioritizing indulgence over my obligations and family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: to excessive and wasteful gambling over my financial responsibilities
prodigality.question: Have I given precedence to excessive and wasteful gambling over my financial responsibilities, potentially harming those who depend on me?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
with friends , family , or online communities
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, while engaging with friends, family, or online communities?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: through conversations with friends or acquaintances
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations with friends or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing others ' personal matters through conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' personal matters through conversations, even if they were true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did I utilize Sunday for secular purposes when it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage rather than seeking reconciliation in my relationships, causing unnecessary hurt to those around me?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
